rules_text:
When this creature transforms into Miriel, Dark Knight, she deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
[i]Slow Burn[/i] – Whenever you draw a card, Miriel, Dark Knight deals 1 damage to each opponent.
[i][i]Rally[/i] Magic[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card.
